article_title: GAME ON? Hillary Clinton tweets about ‘Donald Trump’s hands’ – twitchy.com
article_text:
Here we go again.

It looks like the general election, like the primary, will involve a good deal of talk about Donald Trump’s hands:

"We cannot let Barack Obama’s legacy fall into Donald Trump’s hands." —Hillary — Hillary Clinton (@HillaryClinton) May 2, 2016

We don’t think she went there intentionally, but…

For a start, it’d fall all over the floor. Dude’s got tiny hands https://t.co/MjMVjPosY2 — Lauren Dobson-Hughes (@ldobsonhughes) May 2, 2016

Tiny hands. https://t.co/kwsSXBLheV — Cazique of Poyais (@distantcities) May 2, 2016

*tiny https://t.co/a4V0kcqp5w — Matt (@mattmoore3476) May 2, 2016

We all know his hands aren't large enough to handle Obama's legacy… https://t.co/FiHl6m3nOG — Hilary Matfess (@HilaryMatfess) May 2, 2016

What a wonderful time to be alive.

***
